page.title: 07Energy
page.content: Oil: The study area includes a large part of the 2nd largest on-shore oilfield in U.K.estimated to produce 4000 barrels per day in Phase 1 from 65 wells on 8 wellsites. 3 of the well sites and the gathering station and production are in the block. These cover an area of 10 acres in woodland on Weston Common. Oil,gas and water extracted from the wellsites will be pumped to the gathering station by pipeline where the gas and water will be separated from the oil the gas compressed and both gas and water pumped back into the wellsites to create pressure to raise the oil to the surface. Oil will be pumped by pipeline to the rail/road head at Alton. The oilfield is expected to last for 25/30years and production may be doubled during that period.
